name: letterboxd_scrape_reviews
description: Scrape reviews for a film on Letterboxd. Returns reviewer, rating, and review text.

steps.code: const reviews = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('article.film-detail, article.production-viewing')).slice(0,15).map(rev => { const reviewer = rev.querySelector('strong.displayname, a.context')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const rating = rev.querySelector('span.rating')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const text = rev.querySelector('div.body-text p')?.textContent?.trim()?.substring(0,500)||''; return { reviewer, rating, text }; }).filter(r=>r.text); return { film: '{{film_slug}}', reviews, url: window.location.href }
